suggested_fixes.parameterized_queries: Use prepared statements / parameterized queries. Do not concatenate user input into SQL.
suggested_fixes.input_validation: Validate and sanitize inputs by type and length. Use allow-lists where possible.
suggested_fixes.least_privilege: Ensure the DB account used by the app has only necessary privileges.
suggested_fixes.error_handling: Do not display raw SQL errors to users; log them server-side instead.
suggested_fixes.use_orm_or_safe_api: Consider using an ORM or database API that defaults to parameterized queries.
